data.message:
<-----LIKE NBA FANS!!*** 
NBA Buzz, the place were NBA lovers go to debate about the past, present and future greats of the game. We update scores (Halftime, Final) every night, stats, injury reports and everything NBA! We also do quotes from NBA Players, and historic games everyday, and if it's an NBA Players birthday, we give them a shout out and we do "This Day in NBA History" everyday!
You will love our debates!
PLEASE LIKE US!!!
ARE YOU BUZZING?
